meanings.definition: A type of fish related to the stingray.
meanings.sent1: The raia gracefully glided through the water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a raia swimming near the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: Why did the raia bring a suitcase to the ocean? To have a stingray-cation!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth as a raia's movement in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The raia's unique shape makes it easy to identify in the ocean.

meanings.definition: A flat, round cake made of rice flour.
meanings.sent1: Grandma baked a delicious raia for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of freshly cooked raia filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The raia on the plate looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were as impressive as her ability to make a perfect raia.
meanings.sent5: The raia melted in my mouth, leaving a sweet taste behind.

meanings.definition: A type of skate commonly found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The raia gracefully glided through the shallow waters.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a raia swimming near the pier.
meanings.sent3: Why did the raia wear sunglasses to the beach? To avoid getting a skate tan!
meanings.sent4: The raia's movements were as swift as the wind on the coast.
meanings.sent5: The raia's presence added a touch of elegance to the coastal ecosystem.
